Mod.name: Anvil of Destiny
Mod.description:
Adds a semi-rare room with an anvil to most areas, where you can forge 2 wands into a new one
 with a level that's 1 higher than the lowest of the two. (e.g.: level 3 + level 5 = level 4)
 How? [spoilers] Just open your inventory and drag the wands out of the slots to throw them,
 right unto the anvil... OF DESTINY!
